about.name: Cardano Renewable Energy Stake Pool Alliance
about.description_short: Cardano Renewable Energy Stake Pool Alliance is a loosely affiliated group of Cardano stake pool operators who utilize renewable energy sources to power their pools.
about.description_long: CRESPA's main goal to  promote the use of renewable energy amongst stake pool operators. CRESPA has no central authority or leadership.  We simply believe in a brighter, cleaner tomorrow.
